00005 Game::Game(Rules *rules, void (*endGameCallback)())
00006 {
00007       GameRules = rules;
00008 
00009       GameField = GameRules->CreateField();
00010 
00011       Players = GameRules->CreatePlayers();
00012 
00013       PlayerCount = GameRules->getPlayerCount();
00014 
00015       PlayerIndex = 0;
00016 
00017       EndGameCallback = endGameCallback;
00018 }

00020 Game::~Game()

00029 bool Game::PlaceTile(BlokusTile *blokusTile, u8 x, u8 y)
00030 {
00031       if(GameRules->ValidPlaceTile(GameField, getCurrentPlayer(), blokusTile, x, y))
00032       {
00033             Block b = getCurrentPlayer()->getTeam();
00034             for(unsigned int i = 0; i < blokusTile->getTileData()->Width; ++i)
00035             {
00036                   for(unsigned int j = 0; j < blokusTile->getTileData()->Height; ++j)
00037                   {
00038                         if(blokusTile->getTileData()->Blocks[j*blokusTile->getTileData()->Width + i] != BLOCK_EMPTY)
00039                               GameField->Blocks[(y+j)*GameField->Width + x + i] = b;
00040                   }
00041             }
00042 
00043             GameRules->PlacedTile(GameField, getCurrentPlayer(), blokusTile, x, y);
00044 
00045             if(!getCurrentPlayer()->setNextValidTile())
00046                   EndGame();
00047             else
00048                   CyclePlayers();
00049 
00050             return true;
00051 
00052 /*          Tile *tile = blokusTile->getTileData();
00053 
00054             for(u8 i = 0; i < tile->Width; ++i)
00055             {
00056                   for(u8 j = 0; j < tile->Height; ++j)
00057                   {
00058                         Block b = tile->Blocks[y*tile->Width + x];
00059                         if(b != BLOCK_EMPTY)
00060                               GameField->Blocks[(j+y)*tile->Width + i+x] = b;
00061                         //GameField->Blocks(tile.getBlock(i, j), i+x, j+y);
00062                   }
00063             }
00064 
00065             GameRules->PlacedTile(GameField, blokusTile, x, y);
00066 
00067             return true;*/
00068       }
00069 
00070 
00071       return false;
00072 }

00074 bool Game::SaveGame(const char *path)
00075 {
00076       FILE *file = fopen(path, "w");
00077 
00078       if(file == NULL)
00079             return false;
00080 
00081       // Save field
00082       fwrite(GameField->Blocks, sizeof(Block), GameField->Width * GameField->Height, file);
00083 
00084       // Save player index
00085       fwrite(&PlayerIndex, sizeof(u8), 1, file);
00086 
00087       // Save players
00088       for(u8 playerIndex = 0; playerIndex < PlayerCount; ++playerIndex)
00089       {
00090             Player *player = getPlayer(playerIndex);
00091             bool placedFirstTile = player->PlacedFirstTile();
00092             fwrite(&placedFirstTile, sizeof(bool), 1, file);
00093 
00094             TileSet *tileSet = player->getTileSet();
00095 
00096             for(u8 tileIndex = 0; tileIndex < tileSet->getNumTiles(); ++tileIndex)
00097             {
00098                   u8 amount = tileSet->getTile(tileIndex)->getAmount();
00099                   fwrite(&amount, sizeof(u8), 1, file);
00100             }
00101       }
00102 
00103       fclose(file);
00104       
00105       return true;
00106 }

00108 bool Game::LoadGame(const char *path)
00109 {
00110       FILE *file = fopen(path, "r");
00111 
00112       if(file == NULL)
00113             return false;
00114 
00115       // Read field
00116       fread(GameField->Blocks, sizeof(Block), GameField->Width * GameField->Height, file);
00117 
00118       // Read player index
00119       fread(&PlayerIndex, sizeof(u8), 1, file);
00120 
00121       // Read players
00122       for(u8 playerIndex = 0; playerIndex < PlayerCount; ++playerIndex)
00123       {
00124             Player *player = getPlayer(playerIndex);
00125 
00126             bool playerPlacedFirstTile;
00127 
00128             fread(&playerPlacedFirstTile, sizeof(bool), 1, file);
00129 
00130             if(playerPlacedFirstTile)
00131                   player->UsedTile();
00132 
00133             TileSet *tileSet = player->getTileSet();
00134 
00135             for(u8 tileIndex = 0; tileIndex < tileSet->getNumTiles(); ++tileIndex)
00136             {
00137                   u8 tileAmount;
00138                   fread(&tileAmount, sizeof(u8), 1, file);
00139                   tileSet->getTile(tileIndex)->setAmount(tileAmount);
00140             }
00141       }
00142 
00143       fclose(file);
00144 
00145       return true;
00146 }
